ACCOUNT_2.name: ACCOUNT_2
ACCOUNT_2.description: Accounts contain information about billing for services, while coverages contain information about insurance payors, benefits, subscribers, and members. This table contains one row for each account record in your system. This table is the continuation of the ACCOUNT table.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LAST_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: Last statement's billed amount

columns.name: LAST_INS_BAL
columns.description: Last statement's insurance amount

columns.name: LAST_CLAIM_DATE
columns.description: Last date the claim was produced

columns.name: FOL_UP_LAST_LET_DT
columns.description: Date the last follow-up letter was sent.

columns.name: UNDIST_CREDIT_BAL
columns.description: Total account undistributed credit balance

columns.name: UNDIST_INS_CR_BAL
columns.description: Account undistributed credit balance - insurance credits only.

columns.name: UNDIST_SP_CR_BAL
columns.description: Account undistributed credit balance - self-pay credits only.

columns.name: DIST_LATER_COUNT
columns.description: Number of undistributed credits that are marked as for later distribution in this account.

columns.name: STMT_HOLD_DT
columns.description: The most recent date on which the account was held from the Professional Billing (PB) statement processing.

columns.name: MOBILE_PHONE
columns.description: Mobile phone for guarantor accounts.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DLQ_AMT
columns.description: This is the sum of delinquent payment plan payments.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DUE_AMT
columns.description: This includes both the delinquent amount and the amount due for the current month.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This is the total amount of the payment plan payments.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_REMAIN_AMT
columns.description: This is the remaining amount of the payment plan.

columns.name: HB_EXT_AR_SELF_PAY_BAL
columns.description: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) self-pay balance for the account.

columns.name: HB_EXT_AR_INS_BAL
columns.description: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) insurance balance for the account.

columns.name: HB_EXT_AR_UNDIST_BAL
columns.description: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) undistributed balance for the account.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who initiated the linked address changes.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the linked address change was initiated.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_SOURCE
columns.description: The source record that initiated the linked address changes.

columns.name: PB_SELF_PAY_BAL_UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: This is updated based on changes to patient balance.

columns.name: HB_SELF_PAY_BAL_UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: This is updated based on changes to Hospital Billing (HB) self-pay balance (I EAR 20003).
